post_title: FS: PSA 3 Portraits of Mathewson and Lajoie - BOTH SOLD
post_content:
Hope everyone is doing well!

Looking to move a few bigger ones.  Both are graded PSA 3. Price is net to me. Available via PM. Not looking to trade at this time

$SOLD Matty portrait
